heading: HR00885
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE(S) TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF PROCLAMATION NOS. 137 (S. 1987), 458 (S. 1994) AND 145 (S. 2002)

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00885
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE(S) TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF PROCLAMATION NOS. 137 (S. 1987), 458 (S. 1994) AND 145 (S. 2002)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BENITEZ, ALFREDO "ALBEE" B.
DATE FILED : 2017-03-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
          -(1) Created Ad Hoc Subcommittee on the implementation of Proclamation No. 137 s.87, chaired by Rep. Winston "Winnie" Castelo, and (2) Created Ad Hoc Subcommittee on implementation of Proclamation No. 458, chaired by Rep. Jose Christopher Y. Belmonte
      2. Under deliberation by a Subcommittee on 2017-05-15
      3. Under deliberation by a Subcommittee on 2017-07-13
      4. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-10-11
          -Subcommittee on Housing for the Low-income and Marginalized Group -for reporting out to the mother committee
      5. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2018-02-28
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2017-05-02
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-03-15;
